title: Omnes
content:
Part of: **[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820010843/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Typefaces](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820010843/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Typefaces) : Rounded Typefaces**

Current URL:  
 [http://www.dardenstudio.com/typefaces/omnes](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820010843/http:/www.dardenstudio.com/typefaces/omnes "http://www.dardenstudio.com/typefaces/omnes")

Omnes  
Designed by [Joshua Darden](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820010843/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Joshua%20Darden)  
Design and production assistance by [Jesse Ragan](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820010843/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Jesse%20Ragan).

Originally conceived as the brand typeface for a national retail chain, Omnes fulfills the need for a [rounded typeface](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820010843/http:/typophile.com/wiki/rounded%20typeface) which is neither overly mannered nor excessively literal. A selective approach to rounding adds subtle visual interest, while a large assortment of non- [geometric](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820010843/http:/typophile.com/wiki/geometric) forms pay homage to 19th-century rounded [Grotesque](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820010843/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Grotesque)s which appeared well before the crisp visual style of the [Bauhaus](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820010843/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Bauhaus).

 [http://www.dardenstudio.com/assets/pdf/omnes.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820010843/http:/www.dardenstudio.com/assets/pdf/omnes.pdf "http://www.dardenstudio.com/assets/pdf/omnes.pdf")
author: AndrewSipe
